org.dvb.media

Interface SubtitlingEventControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Control, LanguageControl, SubtitlingLanguageControl

    public interface SubtitlingEventControl
extends SubtitlingLanguageControl
    Allow applications to register and unregister their interest in events related to the availability and presentation of subtitles.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
